metadata.name: 12 Months of Afterlife
metadata.description:
In collaboration with Vogue Singapore, '12 Months of Afterlife' is a calendar collection featuring 12 ethereal bouquets. Afterlife is a garden of transparent plants that represent the liminal space between life and death, and this collection introduces bringing the two worlds together by combining colorful and clear flora. For this series, flowers are the visual ambassadors for each month chosen based on both seasonality and beauty. This piece is a moving collage that combines all 12 artworks accompanied with a soundscape and is Vogue Singapore's digital cover for January/February 2022. 

With the purchase of each NFT, collectors will also receive a physical signed copy of the Vogue Singapore x Luna Ikuta calendar. To collect your limited edition prints, contact vogue@imv.com.sg.

attributes.value: Anemone, Scabiosa, Orchid, Sweet Pea, Lily of the Valley, Dahlia, Tulip, Icelandic Poppy, Hydrangea, Full Star Anemone, Ranunculus, Narcissus
